OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord disease ( Hodgkin 's disease vs non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma ) . Patients receive oral dexamethasone day 1-4 , cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 , gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 4 week , 3 month , every 3 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 44-88 patient ( 22-44 per stratum ) accrue study within 4-10 month .
